Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet
Description: A bright blue glazed faience amulet in the form of the udjat-eye, considered to ensure powerful protection against all malign influences. The eye is further defined with lines of a darker blue. The udjat-eye was worn in life but was also a funerary amulet. The amulet is pierced behind for suspension.
